ADS.Text1: Best Device Support: iOS, Android, Windows, Mac, Chromebooks, Smart TVs, Chromecast, Roku, Fire TV, Gaming Consoles, and any modern Web Browser (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Opera, Edge)
ADS.Text2: Unique Features: The first app that lets you mirror your screen to another device in your WiFi or remote over Internet Connection. You can also create a second screen on another device
ADS.Text3: Fast Customer Support: Customer support has top priority and our team is here to help you via E-Mail, AI-powered Chat and detailed FAQs.
ADS.Text4: How to Use 4K Video Screen Mirroring: Make sure your phone/tablet and smart TV are connected to the same Wi-Fi network.
ADS.Text8: Rate Us 5 Stars And Download 4K Video Screen Mirroring Cast and Enjoy your mobile screen contents using screen mirroring.
